title: Owen Wilson the 'Butterscotch Stallion' shares a kiss with on-again girlfriend Caroline Lindqvist
text:
Owen Wilson is back together with personal trainer Caroline Lindqvist.

The actor, 50, was seen smooching the fit blonde while brunching in New York on Sunday.

The Wedding Crashers star continued to look smitten with Lindqvist, who is the mother of his five-year-old son Finn, when the pair went for a bike ride after their meal.

PDA: Owen Wilson was seen puckering up to on-off girlfriend/mother of his child Caroline Lindqvist in New York on Sunday

Cruising: The Wedding Crashers star continued looked smitten during the duo's bike ride

It seemed like the pair were plenty comfortable with one another, as Owen leaned in to kiss his new flame while she was mid-chew.

Wilson, who was formerly referred to the Butterscotch Stallion in the press, was weekend ready in a crisp button-up teamed with shorts.

Meanwhile, his companion dressed down in a white tee shirt, shorts and a black Malibu trucker hat.

Easy-going: Owen was weekend ready in a crisp button-up teamed with shorts

Wilson and Lindqvist's relationship has been full of ups and downs.

The arrival of son Finn embroiled the Zoolander actor in scandal, as Caroline was married at the time.

Caroline and Owen allegedly dated on and off since meeting at a party in 2003.

Most recently, Owen became the father to his first daughter - Lyla, a little girl born in October 2018.

On and off: Caroline and Owen allegedly dated on and off since meeting at a party in 2003. The pair are seen in March 2019 above

Rumour has it the Hollywood star refuses to see the daughter he shares with ex with ex-girlfriend Varunie Vongsvirates, according to Us Weekly.

Sources told the publication Wilson 'refuses to meet his daughter.'

'He even checked the no visitation box in court in June… He does not want to visit [and does not] want any custody of her,' the insider went on.

The actor also shares son Robert, eight, with ex-girlfriend Jade Duell.
